snippet: Media and technology companies object to portions of a federal effort to strengthen online privacy protections for children.

headline.main: A Trail of Clicks, Culminating in Conflict
headline.print_headline: A Trail of Clicks, Culminating in Conflict

snippet: A federal judge on Madison, Wis., threw out Apple’s suit that licensing practices by Google’s Motorola unit were unfair, saying she was unsure she had the authority to hear the claim.
abstract: Federal Judge Barbara B Crabb in Madison, Wis, throws out Apple's lawsuit against Google's Motorola unit that claimed patent abuse, saying she is unsure she has authority to hear claim; action is setback for iPhone maker in its efforts to gain leverage in smartphone patent wars.

snippet: Nest, the sleek learning thermostat, is officially sold in only two countries, the United States and Canada. But it is being used in 65 countries. Its maker looks at the gray market as a market research opportunity.
abstract: Nest, the sleek learning thermostat, is officially sold in only two countries, the United States and Canada. But it is being used in 65 countries. Its maker looks at the gray market as a market research opportunity.

headline.main: For Nest Thermostat, Gray Markets as Focus Group

snippet: Richard Nelson’s “Sorry” is a real-time drama set on Election Day 2012.
abstract: Richard Nelson's drama Sorry, which opens at Public Theater on Election Day, features tweaked dialogue that reflects up-to-the-minute changes in America's political landscape.

headline.main: The Nation, Refracted in a Family
headline.print_headline: The Nation, Refracted In a Family

snippet: Apple has long promoted the simplicity of its products -- the hardware design, the software interface, the names, the packaging. But with the addition of the iPad Mini, its tablet family has become more complicated.
abstract: Apple has long promoted the simplicity of its products -- the hardware design, the software interface, the names, the packaging. But with the addition of the iPad Mini, its tablet family has become more complicated.

headline.main: Apple's iPad Lineup Gets More Complex

snippet: The antitrust investigation of Google extends beyond search and search advertising to related technologies and markets, where Google's behavior could affect the core search business. Smartphone software is a prime example.
abstract: The antitrust investigation of Google extends beyond search and search advertising to related technologies and markets, where Google's behavior could affect the core search business. Smartphone software is a prime example.

headline.main: Investigating Google Beyond Search -- Smartphone Software

snippet: The effort to reopen schools shut by Hurricane Sandy presented officials with a tangled puzzle and New York City’s 1.1 million students with a drastically altered landscape.
abstract: New York City struggles with logistical and transit snarls in effort to reopen schools shut by Hurricane Sandy; officials scramble to deal with displacements, delayed openings, modified schedules and new plans for evacuees using school buildings in attempt to return students to classrooms as soon as possible.

headline.main: Schools Reopen to Snarls; Transit Headaches Persist
headline.print_headline: Schools Reopen to Snarls; Transit Headaches Persist

snippet: The iPad Mini costs a bit more than competing tablets of a similar size, but Apple said on Monday that it sold three million new iPads in the first weekend that both the smaller iPad and the fourth-generation iPad went on sale. That matches the nu...
abstract: The iPad Mini costs a bit more than competing tablets of a similar size, but Apple said on Monday that it sold three million new iPads in the first weekend that both the smaller iPad and the fourth-generation iPad went on sale. That matches the number of third-generation iPads that Apple sold after the tablet's first weekend on sale in March.

headline.main: Apple Sells Three Million New iPads, Including Mini, in One Weekend

snippet: Given the close presidential race, equities moved marginally higher and lower in quiet, uncommitted dealings.
abstract: Stocks post slight gains in light trading ahead of presidential election.

headline.main: As Decision Day Looms, Trading Seems Indecisive
headline.print_headline: As Decision Day Looms, Trading Seems Indecisive

snippet: Wall Street employees may find it hard to celebrate at bonus time. | As large sections of New York and New Jersey still lack basic essentials, some on Wall Street are looking to help out. | Some important issues still haven't been adequately addre...
abstract: Wall Street employees may find it hard to celebrate at bonus time. | As large sections of New York and New Jersey still lack basic essentials, some on Wall Street are looking to help out. | Some important issues still haven't been adequately addressed in the campaign.
